Articles.Content:
Just a quick question. Something I've noticed when watching videos or looking at images of other people's games is that the little bars in the staging area that tell you how much fuel you have and the SAS force always seem to be about 2x as big as they appear on my screen (in relation to the surrounding UI elements). I've seen this way back since the pre-sales era of the game.

Do they appear smaller because of my resolution or something? If it helps, I run it fullscreen at 1366x768 resolution.
They change size depending on the resolution. Not sure of the details, sorry...
